alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued September 26 at 2:57PM CDT until September 27 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 31 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Koochiching, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, North Itasca and Central St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Deer Creek, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If winds become calm and skies are able to clear, temperatures may be as cold as the upper 20s. This advisory may need to be upgraded to a Freeze Warning if confidence in freeze conditions increases.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
